code:
udf((Arg1: String) => {
    var FstDay: Any = null
    var YearOut: Any = null
    var Ans: Any = null
    var YearIn: Any = null
    var MonthOut: Any = null
    var ExtrnlLstDay: Any = null
    var IntrnlLstDay: Any = null
    var DayOut: Any = null
    var MonthIn: Any = null
    MonthIn = datastage_substring(Arg1, 1.0, 2.0)
    YearIn = datastage_substring(Arg1, 3.0, 2.0)
    MonthIn = MonthIn + 1.0
    if (MonthIn > 12.0) {
      MonthIn = 1.0
      YearIn = YearIn + 1.0
     else {}
    if (YearIn == 100.0) {
      YearIn = 0.0
    } else {}
    FstDay = ds_string_concat(
      ds_string_concat(ds_string_concat(YearIn, ""), MonthIn),
      "01"
    )
    IntrnlLstDay = iconv(FstDay, "DYMD[4,2,2]") - 1.0
    ExtrnlLstDay = oconv(IntrnlLstDay, "DYMD[4,2,2]")
    YearOut = left(ExtrnlLstDay, 4.0)
    MonthOut = datastage_substring(ExtrnlLstDay, 6.0, 2.0)
    DayOut = right(ExtrnlLstDay, 2.0)
    Ans = ds_string_concat(ds_string_concat(YearOut, MonthOut), DayOut)
    Ans
  })
}
